documents.title: KN - Reset To Trial Customers
documents.content:
,,,,,,,,,,,,,

,Purpose: ,,,,,,,,,,,,QUERY  into databricks

,,"New TPT customers who sign up are entitled to a ""Trial"" Box which is smaller in size and lower in price. Due to payment errors or CC/Logistics issues, trial boxes may get canceled. We need to send subscriptions who had their trial box cancelled due to payment error for the New Ventures Tech team to manually ""reset"" subscriptions back to the ""trial"" sku so that this price can be honored on the second box. Once a trial box has been reset for over 4 weeks and customer still has a failed payment, we want to cancel the subscription to avoid further weekly order creations.",,,,,,,,,,,WITH CanceledOrders AS (

,,,,,,,,,,,,,SELECT

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"subscription_id,"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"customer_id,"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,COUNT(order_nr) AS total_canceled_orders

,,,,,,,,,,,,,FROM

,,,,,,,,,,,,,payments_hf.f_orders fo

,Standard of Procedure,,,,,,,,,,,,WHERE

,,,,,,,,,,,,,country = 'KN'

,1,"UPDATE QUERY to make sure hellofresh_delivery_week is CURRENT WEEK and delivery_date is after TODAY's date; Create a new tab in this sheet (i.e. ""2025_W49"")",,,,,,,,,,,"AND latest_status IN ('canceled', 'clarify_payment_error')"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND box_shipped = 0

,2,"From the query results, cancel subscriptions where ""total_canceled_orders = 5+ cancelled orders"" using reason = ""CC-Failed-Payments"" and then delete from list.",,,,,,,,,,,AND product_type = 'mealbox'

,,Cancel subscriptions either individually or using bulk function on BOB,,,,,,,,,,,GROUP BY

,,,Using BOB bulk function:,,,,,,,,,,"fo.subscription_id, fo.customer_id"

,,,Create a CSV with the following headers: ,,,,,,,,,,)

,,,,id,customer_id,reason,,,,,,,SELECT DISTINCT

,,,,,,CC-Failed-Payments,,,,,,,"fo.subscription_id,"

,,,"Upload CSV file using BOB > Bulk > Import > New > Click ""Browse"" to select file > Under Operation, select ""Subscription Cancel"" > Validate > Click New again > Upload",,,,,,,,,,"fo.customer_id,"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"soi.sku,"

,3,"In the ""CC KN Reset"" tab, look for new entries from CC (lines without WEEKNUM function), and amend these subscriptions to new tab (i.e. ""W10"")",,,,,,,,,,,fo.delivery_date

,,,,,,,,,,,,,",CASE"

,4,"Send a question via slack #squad-nv-pet-food, to have an engineer pick up this task. ",,,,,,,,,,,WHEN co.total_canceled_orders >= 5 THEN '5+ boxes cancelled'

,,,type in /new_issue,,,,,,,,,,ELSE co.total_canceled_orders

,,,Yes I want to create a new issue,,,,,,,,,,

,,,Issue Title: ,Reset subscriptions to trial,,,,,,,,,

,,,Select topic: Other,,,,,,,,,,END AS total_canceled_orders

,,,Priority:, High,,,,,,,,,from payments_hf.f_orders fo

,,,Description: subscription_ids found in column A of this spreadsheet Week # <Paste link>,,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN canceledorders co ON fo.subscription_id = co.subscription_id

,,,Expected Behaviour:,Reset trial to subscription,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN dl_bob_live_non_pii.sales_order_item soi ON fo.subscription_id = soi.fk_subscription AND fo.country = soi.business_unit

,Schedule,,Actual Behaviour,Payment errors,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN dimensions.product_dimension pd ON soi.sku = pd.product_sku AND soi.business_unit = pd.country

,,"On Tuesday, we want to take the delivery_dates from Saturday to Tuesday (e.g. On Nov 25, 2025, we want to delivery_dates 2025-11-22 to 2025-11-25)",,,,,,,,,,,LEFT JOIN dl_bob_live_non_pii.subscription s ON soi.fk_subscription = s.id_subscription AND soi.business_unit = s.business_unit

,,"On Friday, we want to take the previous delivery_dates from Wednesday to Friday (e.g. On Nov 28, we want delivery_dates 2025-11-26 to 2025-11-28)",,,,,,,,,,,where fo.country = 'KN'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND customer_loyalty = 0

,,,,,,,,,,,,,"AND latest_status NOT IN ('shipped','money_received')"

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.box_shipped = 0

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND hellofresh_delivery_week >= '2025-W48' --update to current week

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.delivery_date <= '2025-11-25' --update to today's date +1 day

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.dunning_decision = 'cancel'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND fo.product_type = 'mealbox'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND pd.is_trialbox IS TRUE

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND soi.sku LIKE 'KN-T%'

,,,,,,,,,,,,,AND s.canceled_at IS NULL

,,,,,,,,,,,,,ORDER BY

,,,,,,,,,,,,,total_canceled_orders DESC;

documents.title: Research Roadmap & Project Tracking (GCI + IXI + USCI + GCX)
documents.content:
Strategic Anchor,Brand ,Markets ,Project ,Goal,Status,Team Flag,Driver,Approver,Consulted,Informed,Start Date,Completion Date,G-Drive Project Folder,Insights Library Link,General comments 

Foundational Insights,Green Chef,United States (US),Green Chef High Loyalty Deep Dive and Concept Exploration,,4. Complete,USCI-led,Anne Laesecke,Patrick Roney,,,,,,,

#3 Cultural Relevance,HelloFresh,"United States (US), Canada (CA)",Influencer Marketplace: [Strategy] Craft the Vision,"Create an ""Influencer marketplace"" where influencers can benefit from the menu-creation software, sourcing and distribution capabilities and logistics of HF while creating their own ""Marketplace"" based on a HF-provided platform, a ""Shopify for Food"". ",3. In Flight,IXI-led,Annette MvdE,Marc,Katheryn Eckles Joanna Lindenberg,"Jama Musse Nikita Gorshkov, Sam Evans, Nicolas Arias, Codey Friedrich-Goodall, Anna Koklanakis",,"30 Sep, 2025",,,

#1 Value Perception,HelloFresh,Global,Health Claim Validation,"Field a survey that could be used to make claims like ""people who use HelloFresh eat twice as many vegetables""",2. Planned ,GCI-led,Dan-Octavian Balica,Joanna Lindenberg,Bronte Gray Tarn-Weir,Milan Heuer,"15 Jan, 2026","2 Mar, 2026",,,

#1 Value Perception,HelloFresh,Global,How much does it matter?,"an investigation into how much each of the parts of the experiene matter in driving the value perception in a customers mind (brand, price, packaging, recipes, retail media, etc). How do users' budgets and budgetary planning play into drivers/ barriers to sign-up/ stay with us? How do users navigate their budgets and 'nice to have' services like meal kits? What are customers really willing to spend extra on for HF? What is the most critical 'value' or principle each brand should harness? ",2. Planned ,GCI-led,Dan-Octavian Balica,Joanna Lindenberg,,Milan Heuer,"2 Mar, 2026","29 May, 2026",,,

Consumer Closeness,HelloFresh,Sweden (SE),Customer Safari Sweden,"Uncover barriers and motivators for MKs in SE, compared HF to competitors",4. Complete,GCI-led,Bassem Elhelaly,Joanna Lindenberg,,,"8 Jun, 2026","5 Sep, 2025",2025 Q2 | Customer Safari | SE,Page: SE | Customer Safari | 2025,

#1 Value Perception,HelloFresh,Global,Free For Life Product Recommendations for 2026 Peak Campaign,Identify products that align with customer interests and trends more ,4. Complete,GCI-led,Bassem Elhelaly,Joanna Lindenberg,,Marina Kramer Nina Wagner,"3 Mar, 2025","21 Mar, 2025",2025 | Free for life Opportunities for Q1 2026,,

#1 Value Perception,HelloFresh,"Netherlands (NL), United States (US)",Efficient Inspired: Need Gap Analysis,,Deprioritized,GCI-led,,,,,,,,,

Foundational Insights,"HelloFresh, Factor_",Global,GCS Reporting Q1,Quarterly GCS Reporting,4. Complete,GCI-led,Bassem Elhelaly,Joanna Lindenberg,,,,,GCS Distribution tables,,

Foundational Insights,"HelloFresh, Factor_",Global,GCS Reporting Q2,Quarterly GCS Reporting,4. Complete,GCI-led,Bassem Elhelaly,Joanna Lindenberg,,,,,GCS Distribution tables,,

Foundational Insights,"HelloFresh, Factor_",Global,GCS Reporting Q3,Quarterly GCS Reporting,4. Complete,GCI-led,Bassem Elhelaly,Joanna Lindenberg,,,"1 Oct, 2025","15 Oct, 2025",GCS Distribution tables,,

#1 Value Perception,HelloFresh,,Green Box Survey Template,Rollout confirmtion for multi-markets,Deprioritized,GCI-led,,Joanna Lindenberg,,Amélie Breton Milan Heuer Johanna Gerhold Ilaria Baesso Isabell Schmid,,,,,

#1 Value Perception,HelloFresh,Global,Health Claims Behavioral Study Outcomes from using HF,"A way to demonstrate real health outcomes from using HF. Building claims up for 



ll?",2. Planned ,USCI-led,Anne Laesecke,Patrick Roney,,,Q1 2026,,,,

#2 Menu Expansion,Factor_,United States (US),Oven-heated meal line exploration,What kinds of meals would customers be most interested in heating in the oven?,2. Planned ,USCI-led,Anne Laesecke,Patrick Roney,,,Q1 2026,,,,

#2 Menu Expansion,Factor_,United States (US),"New longevity, food as medicine preferences/meal offering validation","Concept testing of meal 'looks' for longevity preference to ensure it meets customer expectations of colorful, nutrient-dense, vegetable forward meals. Additional testing of FAM preferences as developed later in the year.",2. Planned ,USCI-led,Anne Laesecke,Patrick Roney,,,Q1 2026,,,,

Foundational Insights,Factor_,United States (US),Eat Like an Athelete,"As Factor moves along with developing it's ""Eat like an Athelete"" collection, USCI will work on understanding customers/prospects' fitness activities, how they use food for these activities, and perceptions around food needed for strength vs endurance",2. Planned ,USCI-led,Anne Laesecke,Patrick Roney,,,Q2 2026,,,,

#2 Menu Expansion,Factor_,United States (US),Gluten Formats in Factor Meals,"Understand motives for eating vs avoiding gluten among customers and prospects, as well as preferences for dishes that should/should not contain gluten. Additional testing of messaging around gluten free vs gluten content",2. Planned ,USCI-led,Anne Laesecke,Patrick Roney,,,Q2 2026,,,,

Foundational Insights,HelloFresh,Global,IXI Proposal: Journeys of Pain Report,"Collect now to prepare for yearly planning. We would lean on VoC data, data from the AJA tracking, and other in-flight studies",4. Complete,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,

Foundational Insights,"HelloFresh, Factor_, Green Chef",Global,Who are our super loyal customers? How do maintain customer loyalty?,,2. Planned ,USCI-led,,,,Jim Liu-Luecker,,,,,

Foundational Insights,,,"Why do customers cancel? When a customer leaves HFG where do they go? How many users sign up with different mindsets of trialing, competitor switching for discounts, unplanned, etc? ",,1. Requested,Prod Analytics-led,,,,,,,,,

#2 Menu Expansion,HelloFresh,United States (US),XXL Menu Post-Launch Analysis,Unify behavioral analytics plus customer sentiment to tell the whole story (build on the format of the weekly update that CPI has in place for Re-Fresh in the US),2. Planned ,USCI-led,,Patrick Roney,,,,,,,

documents.title: Research Roadmap & Project Tracking (GCI + IXI + USCI + GCX)
documents.content:
Strategic Anchor,Brand ,Markets ,Project ,Goal,Status,Team Flag,Driver,Approver,Consulted,Informed,Start Date,Completion Date,G-Drive Project Folder,Insights Library Link,General comments 

#4 Revamp App Experience,HelloFresh,Global,App interactions that support brand messaging,,1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,

#4 Revamp App Experience,All,Global,Auto Save Revamp,Identify what a best in class autosave experience would be for our customers ,1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,

#5 Efficiency,All,Global,Cross-selling: Cross-selling vision,"Build toward a unified vision or north star for cross-selling - longer term vision, beyond 2026",1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,

#1 Value Perception,All,United States (US),Customer segmentation in funnel in 2026,What should the experience look like for a customized funnel from landing page through checkout? How can we create more campaigns? How can we guide them through the funnel in a way that makes the most sense and creates the most value?,1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,

Foundational Insights,HelloFresh,Global,Dropshipping Expansion and OTP Vision,What would be a longer-term vision for allowing customers to make purchases in the market outside of their subscription?,1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,

Foundational Insights,HelloFresh,Global,Early Customer Experience - what drives customers to stay or leave during their first few weeks?,,1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,

#4 Revamp App Experience,HelloFresh,Global,"Early Customer Experience & E2E Onboarding (formerly Box 3 Drop Off, see below)",De-Risking new onboarding and digital touch points in first 8 weeks as new customers; track product comprehension over time with comprehension metric --> when to ask for what beyond the funnel?,1. Requested,IXI-led,,Marc,,,,,,,

Foundational Insights,HelloFresh,Global,Brand Tracking: Weeknight Dinner TOMA Driver Analysis,Identify the proxy metrics in GBT that drive top of mind awareness for weeknight dinner,Deprioritized,GCI-led,Christine Loof,Joanna Lindenberg,,,,,,,

Foundational Insights,HelloFresh,Global,End-to-End customer experience journey: Moments that Matter ,Real and percieved moments that matter mapping in path to purchase and beyond,1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,

Foundational Insights,HelloFresh,Global,How much of a hindrance to sign-up is our troubling cancellation situation?,SUF questions and reasons for leaving? Across markets and brands?,1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,

#4 Revamp App Experience,HelloFresh,United States (US),Ignite: Meal planning foundational work ,Determine how to best support customers in their meal planning needs,1. Requested,IXI-led,Lexy Martin,Marc,Lexy Martin,Remy Aldasoro Jenna O'Shea Srishti Shah Taruna Verma Brian Lin,,,,,

#1 Value Perception,HelloFresh,Global,IXI Proposal: Trust and Value Perception metric,"Understand how much users trust the HF brand with an option to run for other brand. Plus, value perception measurement (see Factor example) to capture how changes to our monetization model ultimately affects the value perception of the product.",1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,Jessica Blum,,,,,

#4 Revamp App Experience,HelloFresh,United States (US),MoMo: Redesign Reactivations E2E for OTP,"End of September: After the MVP launch, determine if UXR support is needed to de-risk E2E changes to reactivations flow (CRM, marketing, product design)",1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,Shay Ben Yacov,,,,,

Foundational Insights,All,,Competitor Overview,"Provide an overview of all major MK and RTH competitors in each market: product offering, delivery days, monetization model, main benefits/needs they focus on, adv



seness,All,Global,The Customer Book - Market Reference Street,Build a reference sheet of basic information about all markets to streamline decision-making,3. In Flight,USCI-led,Tuğçe Sepetci,Joanna Lindenberg,Helen Kerr Punawit Ganwani Dan-Octavian Balica,,"30 Oct, 2025",,2025 | Foundational Knowledge Reference Sheet,,

Foundational Insights,All,Global,Typing Tool Refinement (data source EI behind the Screen),Refine typing tools for the target segments,3. In Flight,GCI-led,Chih-Chieh Wang,Dan-Octavian Balica,,,"24 Nov, 2025","12 Dec, 2025",,,

#5 Efficiency,HelloFresh,Global,Claim Database,Document all claims and messages being used across all markets (including how they perform and if they are legal approved),Blocked,GCI-led,Helen Kerr,Dan-Octavian Balica,Joanna Lindenberg,Milan Heuer,,,,N/A,

#2 Menu Expansion,HelloFresh,"United States (US), Canada (CA)",Elysium: Introducing Search to the Menu (support menu expansion),Chef's Plate Sprig Survey ,Blocked,IXI-led,Liz Trimber,Marc,Andrea Henry,Mert Bozdag Remy Aldasoro Luiz Cavalcanti Tushar Raina Elisa Marku,,,,,

Foundational Insights,EveryPlate,Australian (AU),EveryPlate Customer Tracker,Track incidence of Functional Eater in EveryPlate customer base,Blocked,GCI-led,Chih-Chieh Wang,Dan-Octavian Balica,,,,,,,

#5 Efficiency,Internal tools,Global,Experience strategy: Supplier Experience,"Make supplier onboarding efficient & cost effective. Map the current-state supplier experience across onboarding, order confirmation, and communication; design segmentation logic and proposed improvements to streamline each stage.",Blocked,IXI-led,Liz Trimber,Marc,,,,,,,

Foundational Insights,Factor_,"United States (US), Netherlands (NL), France (FR), Great Britain (GB)",Factor Global Brand Positioning,Support the insights workstream for finalisation of cross-market Factor brand positioning. Detail tbc,Blocked,GCI-led,Helen Kerr,Brent Raynor,Daniela Gallegos,,"15 Nov, 2025","28 Feb, 2026",,,

#4 Revamp App Experience,HelloFresh,United States (US),Ignite: Ongoing release feedback ,Ongoing feedback during MVP release(s),Blocked,IXI-led,Lexy Martin ,Marc,,Lisa Trueblood,,,,,

Foundational Insights,YouFoodz,Australian (AU),YouFoodz Customer Segment Tracker,"Track the incidence of ""time strapped jugglers"" in the YE customer base over time",Blocked,GCI-led,Chih-Chieh Wang,Dan-Octavian Balica,,,"15 Sep, 2025","30 Jan, 2025",,N/A,

documents.title: Research Roadmap & Project Tracking (GCI + IXI + USCI + GCX)
documents.content:
Strategic Anchor,Brand ,Markets ,Project ,Goal,Status,Team Flag,Driver,Approver,Consulted,Informed,Start Date,Completion Date,G-Drive Project Folder,Insights Library Link,General comments 

#4 Revamp App Experience,HelloFresh,Global,App interactions that support brand messaging,,1. Requested,IXI-led,,,,,,,,,
